reviewText: couldn't play it on my blu-ray.  wrong region code.
Love Helen Mirren shes great. Its an older series but I'm enjoying it now that I got a all region dvd player. Didn't know other region players existed. So heads up to anyone buying this dvd.
Loved the series, but not adaptable to my VCR, DVD. The viewing region  was wrong, I had to see it on my lap top computer.

...you have a DVD player that allows you to play discs from Region 2. I didn't see any such warning about the set (nor did I look for one). Who knew there were "regions for DVRs??! It was a set I've been wanting for years. I saw it on Prime Day at a great price and ordered it. BIG disappointment! And since I opened it, the company won't let me return it for a refund! RIP OFF
